description: See what commands are being input into the device by other people, full credentials can be in the history Author: Austin Clark. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Not commonly run by administrators, especially if remote logging is configured
name: Cisco Show Commands Input
query: (*show\ history* OR *show\ history\ all* OR *show\ logging*)
